She is also an associate curator in the Museumâs Division of Invertebrate Zoology.

Dr. Perkinsâs research has taken her to exotic locales around the world, including to the island of Saba, a relatively unspoiled paradise in the Caribbean where Perkins has led a long-term study of malarial parasites and their host lizard.Â
